title: Whispers of the Forgotten
goal: Blend Kael's local knowledge of strange occurrences with Eldrin's ancient lore, giving the blight a more concrete, current context.
stakes_shift: Kael's grounded knowledge provides practical insights into the blight's immediate effects, while Eldrin's ancient wisdom offers a deeper, unsettling historical context.

bridge.from_prev: Eldrin, Lyra, and Kael have formed a fragile alliance.
bridge.to_next: The group investigates a direct source of corruption, pushing Eldrin to further test his reawakening powers.

sections.title: Shared Histories
sections.intent: Kael shares stories of recent, unsettling events in the region, connecting them to the blight.

scenes.summary: Around a flickering campfire, Kael recounts tales of strange animal behavior, vanishing villagers, and unnaturally fertile or barren lands.
scenes.outcome: Kael's stories provide concrete examples of the blight's current impact on the region.

sections.title: Echoes of Prophecy
sections.intent: Eldrin connects Kael's stories to ancient prophecies or warnings, adding weight to the threat.

scenes.summary: Eldrin, listening to Kael, finds unsettling parallels with ancient prophecies and warnings of a encroaching darkness, sharing fragments of lore.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin links Kael's observations to ancient prophecies, hinting at a larger, preordained conflict.

sections.title: A New Purpose
sections.intent: Kael begins to see a purpose beyond mere survival, swayed by the scope of the threat.

scenes.summary: The sheer scale of the threat, revealed through Eldrin's words, begins to stir a forgotten sense of duty within Kael.
scenes.outcome: Kael's mercenary resolve wavers, replaced by a nascent sense of responsibility towards the growing darkness.
